verses.name: Daniel 8:22
verses.text: Now that being broken, whereas four stood up for it, four kingdoms shall stand up out of the nation, but not in his power.

verses.name: Daniel 8:23
verses.text: And in the latter time of their kingdom, when the transgressors are come to the full, a king of fierce countenance, and understanding dark sentences, shall stand up.

verses.name: Daniel 8:24
verses.text: And his power shall be mighty, but not by his own power: and he shall destroy wonderfully, and shall prosper, and practise, and shall destroy the mighty and the holy people.
